Text.Page:
I knew the argons were here for something, but interfering with Saleron? That's strange. I thought argons were all about "destroy everything, mortal or not."

Regardless, all this endless scouting has paid off. I know who—or what—leads the argons: a creature named Zhaathi.

Take out Zhaathi, and I bet the argons will crawl back down their holes.

That'll teach those argons to mess with the federation, huh, ?

Any minute now, they'll probably retreat to wherever their underground lair is. Yep. Any minute now....
